node.address: Calle Principal # 072 Isla Baru Santa Ana, Playa Blanca Cartagena , Cartagena, Colombia

content.value:
We are in Playa Blanca, Isla Barú, one of the most beautiful beaches of the Caribbean, just 50 minutes from Cartagena old city and 10 minutes walking from parking # 2 to the Nacional Park Los Corales. We have a perfect location in front the sea.

We have eight privates rooms with private bathrooms and two shared dormitories with 4 and 8 beds. Rooms have towels, fan, electricity and water. Breakfast is included and guests have 50% discount on sun beds from the beach club.

Nena Beach & Hotel, located opposite Barú Beach, features a restaurant and a bar. It has a tour desk and terrace. Free Wi-Fi and room service are offered.
The hotel serves a continental breakfast.
Isla Barú is 11 km from Nena Beach & Hotel.

description.description: Nena Beach Club & Hostel is a new exclusive space with services and products designed for the traveler of the world in one of the most beautiful beaches of the Caribbean, 50 minutes from Cartagena. Cooking, music, drinks, comfort and activities that will make your days on the beach and by the sea an experience full of unique and unforgettable moments.
